description: Unique identifier of the picklist configuration tied to the field; likely a foreign key to the list definition. Confirm whether it points to the list header versus individual items with an SME.
Identifier of the application field that this mapping applies to; typically joins to the field metadata table to determine where the picklist is used in screens, forms, or data capture.
Name of the lookup source providing permissible values for the field, stored as a table identifier (e.g., billing codes, fuel types); used to populate dropdown options and validate inputs.
